mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{user_name}, #{user_id}, #{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_roles}, #{user_provider}, #{user_address}, #{user_gender}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select user_code, user_name, user_email, user_password, user_roles, user_provider from user_mst where user_name = #{user_name}
